name: SH-ESD
paper: Automatic Anomaly Detection in the Cloud Via Statistical Learning.
description: Some time series might contain relatively high percentage of anomalies. To address such cases, coupled with the fact that mean and standard deviation (used by ESD) are highly sensitive to a large number anomalies, S-ESD is extended to SH-ESD, which use the robust statistics median and median absolute deviation (MAD) to detect anomalies.
bibtex: @article{Hochenbaum2017AutomaticAD,title={Automatic Anomaly Detection in the Cloud Via Statistical Learning},author={Jordan Hochenbaum and Owen Vallis and Arun Kejariwal},journal={ArXiv},year={2017},volume={abs/1704.07706},}
